name: Psyolence
description:
Psyolence is an arcade hardcore top-down slasher with neon graphics. Pick up katana and start slashing enemies in cyberspace! You will meet 15 levels of drive and speed, filled with tons of neon, after which you can fight and defeat the boss.

Features:

- Bright neon visual
- Fast paced and challenging gameplay
- 15 levels of cyberviolence
